name: Stay Positive (thebluepenguin1)
description:
Stay Positive is a  top-down shooter made for ScoreSpace #18 Game Jam

The goal of Stay positive is to keep your positive magnet positive by not touching the negative magnets. The goal of the negative magnets if to make your positive magnet think negativly.

The negative magnets drop  coins, coins improve your score.

This game was made in 2 days for the ScoreSpace#18 game jam, this is also the first game jam i have participated in.

NOTE: the "quit" button does not work in web mode, do not press it.
